name: Anarchy
description: You fire a 3-unit cone of chaotic energy and deal 8 psychic damage to the creatures within who fail a resilience check of 8. If you do not have at least 2 successes, the spell instead becomes a 3 unit radius, dealing damage to you and any other creatures within.
charge: The damage is increased to 12 psychic damage and gives the maddened condition to any creature who takes 8 or more psychic damage after mitigation.
